Title: Mechanic: Resurrection
Writer: Lewis John Carlino (based upon the characters created by), Philip Shelby (story by), Philip Shelby (screenplay by), Tony Mosher (screenplay by)
Actors: Jason Statham, Jessica Alba, Tommy Lee Jones, Michelle Yeoh
Plot: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.
Production: Lionsgate Films, Millennium Films, Chartoff-Winkler Productions
